name: Pidgeon Force!
description:
This is a simple game made in ANSCII C by Manuel Morales Amat, an informatic engineering. So you shall not to expect good graphics or good mechanics, just a simple game made in raw c, no graphics at all.

I NOT RECOMEND PHOTOPHOBIC OR EPILEPTIC TO PLAY THE GAME!!

Some times, you will see the game gots frozen, its because DOS windows cannot manage more characters and calculus, wait a few seconds. Also if  you go to the right limit andyou touch an object you will be launched outside of the game borad without taking damage, please don't abuse this bug.

Its based on an infinite and random generation, so you win when you are the one with the most score in the room.

Please, leave a comment and rate!!
